message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.

I can go a bit lower, but 58-42 is as far as I'll go for now.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm offering a 52/48 split.  Let's close this deal.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 57-43. Don't let the clock run out!
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. 51/49, my final offer.
